White Oak ISD is in communication with DPS, the Weather Service, WO Emergency Management and WO PD. We will monitor the situation closely. Any significant updates will be disseminated via School Messenger, Skyward Email, the website, blogs and campus social media pages.

Thank you for your continued support of all things Roughneck!

This year we have implemented some changes in our bus drop off and pick up procedures that we feel will prove to be more efficient and safer for our students. To avoid the congestion of cars and buses traveling the same route, this year all buses will drop off students in the morning and pick up students in the afternoon at the Primary Entrance along the north side of the building. The video below shows the yellow bus and the route that will be taken to safely ensure that all bus riders get inside the building without needing to pass between any other vehicles. Please be patient with us as we try to navigate this new system and work through any needed adjustments.

Also, this year both the Primary and Intermediate campuses will dismiss together. Remember that this is the first time that some of the younger children have walked in a line and loaded a bus. The first week always takes longer to load the buses, therefore, students may arrive home a little later than expected. Rest assured that our transportation department will deliver your child safely.
